pageContext.description: Splendidly preserved. Edges very regular and sharp.
pageContext.surface: Smooth. Dark bronze colour, golden bronze showing in places.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,Professor Sir Lucas White-King, CSI, LLD, FSA,Late of Roebuck Hall - Co. Dublin,Sold by Auction at Sotheby's 9.11.21, Lot 151
pageContext.site: Ireland,Co. Mayo,Ballyarris,1896,Labelled: "Found by Pat Clesham, farmer of Carrakillen, Ballyarris in the bog of Annies on 17th June 1896 about 16 feet fown. It had a wooden handle with knob + hand guard apparently of metal, which crumbled away when touched."
